description: The F3710-235040 acoustic Sonar is to be used to support research activities for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO). This is to be a sole-source acquisition, the Institute wishes to purchase the supply and delivery of an acoustic sonar from a single source and have it delivered to 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada                .

full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Introduction

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) intends to purchase the supply and delivery of an acoustic sonar system for research activities. The tender is now closed.

## Summary

The conditions of this tender are outlined below.

### Tender Details

* Tender Title: Acoustic Sonar System
* Solicitation Number: WS4308358960
* Submission Date: December 13, 2023, at 14:00 hours
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 20, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

### Contact Information

* Name: Ioana Novac (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email Address: Ioana.novac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not Available

### Tender Description

The Maurice Lamontagne Institute wishes to purchase an acoustic sonar system for their research activities.

### Trade Agreement

This tender is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Delivery

The successful bidder will be required to deliver the acoustic sonar system to Mont-Joli.

### Important Notes

* The tender process is closed, and no bids will be accepted beyond the closing date.
* The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) reserves the right to reject any bid that does not meet the requirements outlined in the tender documents.

### URL for Additional Information

The tender documentation can be accessed at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18133554?extsite=MTgxMzM1NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18133554?extsite=MTgxMzM1NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
